_header: What women be in deed why should not all men know
_description: ?Robert Jernegan, On women, claiming them to be fickle to their friends and spiteful to their foes — a long couplet signed ‘Robert Iernegan’

CamTCC1037.Note: Added on a flyleaf in a sixteenth-century hand.
CamTCC1037.Facsimiles:
Digital Facsimile of Trinity College Cambridge MS O.1.13.
         https://mss-cat.trin.cam.ac.uk/Manuscript/O.1.13.
